stepTitle: The average velocity of the athlete over the time interval: $$[1.95$$, $$2.05]$$ is $$6.00041666$$. The average velocity of the athlete over the time interval: $$[1.995$$, $$2.005]$$ is $$6.00000416$$. The average velocity of the athlete over the time interval: $$[1.9995$$, $$2.0005]$$ is $$6.00000004$$. The average velocity of the athlete over the time interval: [2, $$2.00001]$$ is $$6.00000999$$. Use these statements to guess the instantaneous velocity of the athlete at $$t=2$$ sec. Write as an integer.
